works.description:
The blogger  
(http://dmuantskilton.blogspot.com/2010/10/paranormal-activity-2-film-review.html)
 
has used our image in their article. While it is not intended for  
commercial use, it is still our image and our copyright, and we did not  
give permission. I have tried contacting the author several times, but I  
have had no response (I even left a comment on the post itself).

I believe it may have been taken from this article about our project:
